divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving on the 280 fyw going to San Francisco, I was about 10 miles from S F airport & I saw the airplanes taking off from air port & as I was seeing the airplanes on the sky I saw an strip of lights, they where I will say about 200 ft long & all together were about 20 to 25 lights, they were moving from side to side, at the begining I tought that that was an air plane but I saw the air planes close to the lights & it was bigger than the air planes, as I was driving the lights went behind the clouds & I lost them. I was very excited to see them, unfotunately I was driving & I couldn't stop to take a picture.
